snippet: A recent study shows that many threatened species are growing in number, highlighting new conservation techniques that put the emphasis on better use of land.

byline.original: By STANLEY REED | THE NEW YORK TIMES

lead_paragraph: A recent study shows that many threatened species are growing in number, highlighting new conservation techniques that put the emphasis on better use of land.

headline.main: A Rebound for Some Wildlife in Europe
headline.print_headline: A Rebound for Some Wildlife in Europe
